comment._content: Another view of Excelsior without the tarpaulin on deck: images.slsa.sa.gov.au/godson/1/01250/PRG1258_1_1123.htm From State Library of South Australia: " Registered at Port Adelaide, 1873, and Sydney, 1890, official number 64215. Built at Goolwa, 1873, by A. Graham."
